actions.description: The fomorian makes two Slam attacks and uses Crawling Hex if it is available.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: The fomorian targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 31 (7d8) psychic damage, have the prone condition, and become cursed for 1 hour. While cursed this way, the target can't stand up and end the prone condition on itself.
actions.name: Crawling Hex (Recharge 4-6)

specialTraits.description: The fomorian can enter a space large enough for a Large creature without squeezing.
specialTraits.name: Contortionist

specialTraits.description: While the fomorian has the prone condition, crawling does not cost it extra movement. In addition, the prone condition does not grant advantage on attack rolls against the fomorian.
specialTraits.name: Crawling Stance

specialTraits.description: The fomorian can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb
